divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were driving home down main street around 1 am and i see this huge light i though it was an airplane that was about to crash but then i looked closer and realized it wasnt an airplane because it was triangle shaped and it had no sound. in other words, it was low enough to the ground to see its full shape. it eased down and then flipped really really quick and went back the way it came and dissapeared within 5 seconds.... i was freaking out. then i went home and drew a picture of it.
trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Roswell
There were no other sightings in Roswell on or around February 21st 2008
Summary: really close to ground and dissapeared within 5 sec
